trans-unit.source: Provides data for workflow events.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce i dati per gli eventi del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: Workflow events are associated with a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Gli eventi del flusso di lavoro sono associati a un'istanza del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> associated with the workflow event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> contiene gli oggetti <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> associati all'evento del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> or an object that derives from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> class provides the data for all of the workflow events in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> o un oggetto che deriva dalla classe <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> fornisce i dati per tutti gli eventi del flusso di lavoro nella classe <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> is the base class for <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowCompletedEventArgs>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowSuspendedEventArgs>, and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowTerminatedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs> è la classe base per <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowCompletedEventArgs>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowSuspendedEventArgs> e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowTerminatedEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to obtain a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> object using the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs.WorkflowInstance%2A> property when an event handler method is called.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come ottenere un oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> utilizzando la proprietà <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs.WorkflowInstance%2A> quando viene chiamato un metodo del gestore eventi.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowIdled> event occurs, the `OnWorkflowIdled` method defined in this example is called.
trans-unit.target: Quando si verifica l'evento <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowIdled> viene chiamato il metodo `OnWorkflowIdled` definito in questo esempio.

trans-unit.source: It determines which workflow is idled using the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs.WorkflowInstance%2A> property and then gets a collection of queued items for the workflow instance by calling the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.GetWorkflowQueueData%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Determina quale flusso di lavoro venga reso inattivo mediante la proprietà <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs.WorkflowInstance%2A> e quindi ottiene una raccolta di elementi in coda per l'istanza del flusso di lavoro chiamando il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.GetWorkflowQueueData%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The code iterates over the collection to determine which activity is waiting for the event that idled the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Il codice scorre la raccolta per determinare quale attività è in attesa dell'evento che ha sospeso il flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: It then sends an exception to the workflow queue using the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.EnqueueItem%2A> method along with the name of the event queue item.
trans-unit.target: Invia quindi un'eccezione alla coda del flusso di lavoro mediante il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.EnqueueItem%2A> insieme al nome dell'elemento in coda dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the Canceling a Workflow SDK Sample from the Program.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Questo esempio di codice fa parte dell'esempio SDK Canceling a Workflow nel file Program.cs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Canceling a Workflow](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d5077f56-a78b-48e7-825c-f6c77c8e54fb).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [l'annullamento di un flusso di lavoro](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d5077f56-a78b-48e7-825c-f6c77c8e54fb).

trans-unit.source: Gets the workflow instance associated with the workflow event.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un'istanza del flusso di lavoro associata all'evento del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance" /> associated with the workflow event.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance" /> associato all'evento del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to obtain a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> object using the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs.WorkflowInstance%2A> property when an event handler method is called.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come ottenere un oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> utilizzando la proprietà <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs.WorkflowInstance%2A> quando viene chiamato un metodo del gestore eventi.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowIdled> event occurs, the `OnWorkflowIdled` method defined in this example is called.
trans-unit.target: Quando si verifica l'evento <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowIdled> viene chiamato il metodo `OnWorkflowIdled` definito in questo esempio.

trans-unit.source: It determines which workflow is idled using the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs.WorkflowInstance%2A> property and then gets a collection of queued items for the workflow instance by calling the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.GetWorkflowQueueData%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Determina quale flusso di lavoro venga reso inattivo mediante la proprietà <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs.WorkflowInstance%2A> e quindi ottiene una raccolta di elementi in coda per l'istanza del flusso di lavoro chiamando il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.GetWorkflowQueueData%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The code iterates over the collection to determine which activity is waiting for the event that idled the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Il codice scorre la raccolta per determinare quale attività è in attesa dell'evento che ha sospeso il flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: It then sends an exception to the workflow queue using the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.EnqueueItem%2A> method along with the name of the event queue item.
trans-unit.target: Invia quindi un'eccezione alla coda del flusso di lavoro mediante il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.EnqueueItem%2A> insieme al nome dell'elemento in coda dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the Canceling a Workflow SDK Sample from the Program.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Questo esempio di codice fa parte dell'esempio SDK Canceling a Workflow nel file Program.cs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Canceling a Workflow](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d5077f56-a78b-48e7-825c-f6c77c8e54fb).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [l'annullamento di un flusso di lavoro](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d5077f56-a78b-48e7-825c-f6c77c8e54fb).
